For the obsolete card, see [[Hammer card]].'' {{weapon |name = Hammer |cost = ? |skill = Maces & Flails |damage = 8 |accuracy = +3 |basedelay = 14 (140%) |mindelay = 7 at skill 14 |hands = 1H |size = Little |ranged = No |acquirement = ? }} {{flavour|A blunt striking weapon, essentially equivalent to a mace. ---- "The hammah that John Henry swung,
It weighed over nine poun',
He broke a rib in his left han' side,
And his intrils fell on the groun',
And his intrils fell on the groun'." -Onah L. Spencer, _John Henry_. Early 20th cent.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the [[Maces & Flails]] category. It is a one handed weapon, and it is better for the strong.}} The '''hammer''' is a novelty weapon with the same stats as a [[mace]]. It can only be found in [[vault]]s, most notably [[Crazy Yiuf|Crazy Yiuf's]] cottage. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Hammer1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Hammer2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Hammer3.png]] |} ==History== {{weapon |name = Hammer |cost = ? |weight = 9.0 |damage = 7 |accuracy = +3 |basedelay = 13 (130%) |mindelay = 6 at skill 12 |hands = 1H |ranged = No |skill = Maces & Flails |size = ? |acquirement = ? }} *Hammers were reintroduced as [[0.29]], using the same stats as a mace. Their original stats are listed here. *Hammers were removed in [[0.17]]. *Prior to [[0.13]], hammers were ordinary weapons which you could find randomly generated throughout the Dungeon. {{weapons}} [[Category:Maces & Flails]]
